name: VR Run to the Z
description:
Run through the world where so many zombies wandering.
How much time can you survive?
How much long distance can you run ?

Zombies wander the darkness, they are wandering everywhere.
You must be running through their slight gap.

(Normal mode)
Move out of the zombie by tilting your smartphone to the left and right.
It fired a bullet when you tap.

(VR mode)
Please set the VR HMD such as Google Cardboard,botsnew or else.
Bullet will be automatic fire.
Fear of looming zombie will be maximum in VR world.
* VR mode is not available on iPad.

(Weapon setting)
Depending on the score, you can select a weapon.
- pistol
- Sub-machine gun
- Shotgun
- Crossbow
- and more...

This is Free game.
No billing in game.
